newArrivals.name: Pistachio
newArrivals.description: Fresh, crunchy pistachio kernels, rich in healthy fats, protein, and fiber. A great addition to your diet for improving heart health.

newArrivals.name: Cashew
newArrivals.description: Delicious and crunchy Cashew Nuts rich in healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals that support heart health, boost immunity, and enhance brain function. A great addition to salads or trail mixes.

newArrivals.name: Saffron Cream
newArrivals.description: Luxurious cream infused with pure saffron, known for its nourishing and revitalizing properties. Enhances skin texture and promotes a radiant glow.

newArrivals.name: Saffron Facial Kit
newArrivals.description: Complete facial kit with saffron-based products to provide a glowing, radiant complexion. Perfect for a luxurious home spa experience.
